channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: These charts show how Trump's strategy to lose by less won back several swing states
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump won the election by flipping Georgia, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin after President Biden won them in 2020. Looking at how Democratic counties voted explains how he did it.
item.content:encoded:
President-elect Donald Trump won the election by flipping Georgia, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin after President Biden won them in 2020. Looking at how Democratic counties voted explains how he did it.

(Image credit: Jim Watson)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: Qatar suspends mediation efforts between Israel and Hamas
item.description: The Arab Gulf nation, a U.S. ally that has been a haven for Hamas leaders for nearly two decades, also said it will no longer host the Palestinian militant group’s political office, an official said.
item.content:encoded:
The Arab Gulf nation, a U.S. ally that has been a haven for Hamas leaders for nearly two decades, also said it will no longer host the Palestinian militant group’s political office, an official said.

(Image credit: Eyad Baba)
item.dc:creator: Aya Batrawy

item.title: 13 states will have women governors next year, a new record
item.description: Republican Kelly Ayotte's victory in New Hampshire will bring the total number of women holding governor’s offices to 13 — surpassing the previous high of 12 set in 2023.
item.content:encoded:
Republican Kelly Ayotte's victory in New Hampshire will bring the total number of women holding governor’s offices to 13 — surpassing the previous high of 12 set in 2023.

(Image credit: Charles Krupa)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: 'Candyman' star Tony Todd dies at 69
item.description: The versatile actor had hundreds of screen credits to his name, including Platoon, The Rock and Final Destination.
item.content:encoded:
The versatile actor had hundreds of screen credits to his name, including Platoon, The Rock and Final Destination.

(Image credit: Matt Sayles)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: Officials say Qatar has decided to suspend its mediation efforts on Gaza
item.description: Qatar has decided to suspend its key mediation efforts between Hamas and Israel, officials said Saturday. The announcement comes after growing frustration with the lack of progress on a deal.
item.content:encoded:
Qatar has decided to suspend its key mediation efforts between Hamas and Israel, officials said Saturday. The announcement comes after growing frustration with the lack of progress on a deal.

(Image credit: Abdel Kareem Hana)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Donald Trump wins Nevada
item.description: Former President Donald Trump has won Nevada’s six electoral votes, according to a race call from the Associated Press. This is the first time in 20 years that Nevada has elected a Republican in a presidential election.
item.content:encoded:
Former President Donald Trump has won Nevada’s six electoral votes, according to a race call from the Associated Press. This is the first time in 20 years that Nevada has elected a Republican in a presidential election.

(Image credit: David Becker)
item.dc:creator: Ashley Lopez

item.title: Dinosaurs unearthed in China may have ended with a collapse, not a catastrophe
item.description: There's an area in China that's home to a huge trove of dinosaur fossils. It used to be thought it was formed through a Pompeii-like volcanic eruption, stopping dinosaurs in their tracks. But new evidence has come to light about how it likely came to be.
item.content:encoded: There's an area in China that's home to a huge trove of dinosaur fossils. It used to be thought it was formed through a Pompeii-like volcanic eruption, stopping dinosaurs in their tracks. But new evidence has come to light about how it likely came to be.
item.dc:creator: Ari Daniel

item.title: Opinion: Witnessing my daughters' first votes was a moment to remember
item.description: NPR's Scott Simon accompanied his daughters to the polls, as they voted in their first presidential election.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's Scott Simon accompanied his daughters to the polls, as they voted in their first presidential election.

(Image credit: Vincent Ni)
item.dc:creator: Scott Simon

item.title: Foreign Interference Recap
item.description: We look at the various threats sent to polling places on election day this week, as well as the extent to which foreign actors tried to interfere with the presidential election.
item.content:encoded: We look at the various threats sent to polling places on election day this week, as well as the extent to which foreign actors tried to interfere with the presidential election.
item.dc:creator: Huo Jingnan

item.title: They split the ticket. Meet the abortion rights voters who also went for Trump
item.description: Data from a large survey of U.S. voters found that a significant subset of voters who supported abortion rights ballot measures also voted for Trump.
item.content:encoded:
Data from a large survey of U.S. voters found that a significant subset of voters who supported abortion rights ballot measures also voted for Trump.

(Image credit: Matt York)
item.dc:creator: Sarah Varney
